UC Kochi Post Office AC Service and Repair 4.84 (6.5 M bookings) UC COVER Verified repair quotes & warranty Verified repair quotes & warranty Select a service Service Repair & gas refill Install & uninstall Service 30 DAYS WARRANTY Deep clean AC service (split) 4.83 (1.2M reviews) ₹749 45 mins Get 2X deeper dust removal with foamjet technology Thorough cleaning of both indoor & outdoor AC units View details Add 30 DAYS WARRANTY Deep clean AC service (window) 4.82 (355.6K reviews) ₹649 45 mins Get 2X deeper dust removal with foamjet technology View details Add 30 DAYS WARRANTY Anti-rust deep clean AC service 4.86 (25K reviews) ₹999 ₹1,099 60 mins Prevents frequent gas leakages through unique anti-rust formula Applicable on both split and window ACs View details Add 30 DAYS WARRANTY Service lite 4.80 (55.5K reviews) ₹549 30 mins Servicing for regular maintenance Recommended for ACs serviced 3-4 months ago View details Add Repair & gas refill Spare part prices UPTO 180 DAYS WARRANTY AC repair (split/ window) 4.78 (313.9K reviews) Starts at ₹299 Detailed issue diagnosis with same day resolution Visit charges of ₹299 will be adjusted in the final bill View details Add 4 options UPTO 180 DAYS WARRANTY Gas leak fix & refill 4.83 (50.5K reviews) ₹2,500 2 hrs Thorough diagnosis, leak identification & fixing, gas refill to avoid leakages View details Add Install & uninstall 30 DAYS WARRANTY Install 4.75 (82.1K reviews) Starts at ₹799 Installation of indoor & outdoor units with free gas check Procurement of spare parts (at extra cost) View details Add 2 options 30 DAYS WARRANTY Uninstall 4.87 (79.5K reviews) Starts at ₹399 Uninstallation of both indoor & outdoor units View details Add 2 options No items in your cart Buy More Save More 30% off 2nd item onwards Ac Service And Repair in Kochi, India Get your window or split AC service in Kochi, India done by Urban Company's Power Jet AC Service technicians. We offer you a 90 Day service guarantee with INR 10k insurance against damage for every AC serviced. Also get a no questions asked 90 day revisit policy. Only genuine spare parts are supplied with fixed pricing. Urban Company will help you connect with the best AC services to cater your needs, right at your doorstep. Dhanish November 2023 • Kerala 683563, India 4 Good consultation Clive November 2023 • Edappally, Ernakulam, Kochi, Kerala 682033, India 5 Really helpful service from Shanavas Jenica November 2023 • Kakkanad, Kerala, India 5 Excellent work done Aakhil October 2023 • Kerala 683563, India 5 Good and fas Subhash November 2023 • Aluva, Kerala 683108, India 5 Great timely service, reasonable rates Mohan November 2023 • Kerala 683108, India 5 Was more or less on Time, was very professional in the work, had all the tools & machinery for the job, and did the servicing/ cleaning thoroughly. Very satisfied. Show more reviews About Ac Service And Repair Services offered in AC Service and Repair 1. Installing an AC: Choose this service for AC installation at your place. The professional will ensure that the AC is running properly as gas pressure and performance of the appliance will be checked post AC installation. 2. Uninstalling an existing AC: Select this option when you need professionals to dismount an AC. The appliance will be checked before the AC uninstallation. 3. Wet services: This service includes an end to end cleaning of your AC (which is not faulty). Cooling coils, condenser coils, outer panel, drain and filet pipes will be extensively cleaned and washed. However, high-pressure jet pumps will not be used for the cleaning purpose. Tick this service when you want your AC to be properly cleaned. 4. Repairs: Choose this option for diagnosis and repair of your AC. The professional will check the AC upon visitation and provide with quotation depending on the condition of the appliance. Why Urban Company AC Service and Repair? 1. Customer Protection: Unlike any other service provider, Urban Company provides a customer protection of Rs. 10,000 against damages. 2. Verified Professionals: All the professionals on board with Urban Company are taken through a screening process to check for their expertise. 3. Service Warranty: We at Urban Company take full ownership of our services and hence, this is the reason that we provide a service warranty of 30 days. 4. Customer Centric: All our services are curated keeping our customers in mind and AC repair service is no exception. 5. Standardized pricing: To save our customers from unfair pricing, we have come up with the idea of standardized pricing with the rate card shared on both our website and App. 6. Online payment: Now pay hassle free post your service through our online portal. You will receive a link via SMS and/or email which will take you to the online payment portal. Like any other machinery, an appliance such as AC needs to be maintained and looked after for its healthy functioning. Hence, the appliance should receive a proper service before the start of summer season. After all, nothing can be worse than a broken or faulty AC. Hunting a service personnel for AC repair in the sultry weather can be a hassle. You can now book a professional either for service and repair within minutes from your home. You don’t even need to clear your schedule as you can choose your desirable time slot. Urban Company’s AC repair service has proven to be a blessing for our customers as we continue to receive happy testimonials and ratings from our customers. How it works? To find the best professionals near you in no time, you just need to go on the Urban Company website or App and search for ‘AC Repair’ in the search tab. A pop up tab will open up wherein you will need to fill in the details according to your requirements. Questions such as what kind of service is required – split AC or window AC, location, time, etc. compromise the questionnaire. Once your request is uploaded on the portal, a professional will be at your doorstep at your requested time and location.
